generated_body: In the article titled "What Happens When a Plane Collides with a Flock of Birds?", the user is likely to expect an informative exploration of the phenomenon known as bird strikes. This may include an overview of the mechanics involved in such collisions, the potential risks to aircraft safety, and the protocols that airlines and pilots follow to mitigate these incidents. Additionally, the article could provide statistics on the frequency of bird strikes and their impact on aviation, as well as insights into how the aviation industry works to minimize these occurrences.
